attributes.title: Propaganda
attributes.review: Downloaded this because I wanted to see what he had to say. It was ridiculous how biased and finger-pointing all of the talking points were. There was a survey pushed out that literally was just slander over and over again. If this man wants to get the votes of decent, mature adults he should consider stopping that. I know the slandering is happening on both sides by all constituents, but I have more respect for a person who doesnâ€™t whine about every little thing, takes responsibility for past mistakes made and listens to the entire nation and their wants rather than pandering to a base that doesnâ€™t seem to be representative of America and her supposed values.

attributes.title: DO NOT BUY ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I wanted to be able to talk to the president about how heâ€™s doing. You know maybe tell him that he should give EVERYONE THE SAME RIGHTS.

Anyway, when I downloaded this app and opened it for the first time, I was greeted to a TERRIFIC SIGHT! It was this orange monster with blonde hair all over it. I screamed so hard, and ended up throwing my phone out my window, which landed IN THE TRASH AND IT WAS GARBAGE DAY!!! So they ended up taking my phone to the dump. So BECAUSE OF THIS APP, I HAD TO SPEND 3 WHOLE MONTHS, saving up money for a new phone.

Then I downloaded the app again, and then when I opened the app it made my NEW IPHONE TURN OFF. I tried charging it for AN HOUR, but that didnâ€™t work, I put it in rice to see if maybe water somehow got in my phone but that didnâ€™t work ether. So I had to go to repair my phone, turns out the app gave my phone A VIRUS so thatâ€™s why it wasnâ€™t turning on. So then my mom gave me her old phone.

SO UNLESS YOU WANT A VIRUS TO BE PUT ON YOUR PHONE, then Iâ€™d recommend NOT getting this app.
